description: Grants the user's body the ability to transform parts into scissors and cut through any solid material as if it were paper, making the user a Scissors Human.

users.circumstances: Inazuma previously ate the fruit and serves as Emporio Ivankov's deputy commander

abilityReveals.description: User can cut solid stone floors into strips as if cutting paper, then manipulate the cut pieces.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Inazuma cuts the stone floor of Level 6 into strips and folds them to block sleeping gas from reaching Luffy, Ivankov, and himself.

abilityReveals.description: User can fold cut materials to create protective barriers or structures.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: After cutting the floor, Inazuma folds the stone strips over the staircase to seal off the sleeping gas.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim in water

strengths.strength: Can cut through any solid material regardless of hardness
strengths.description: The fruit allows the user to treat any solid object as if it were paper, cutting through stone, metal, and other materials effortlessly.
By cutting and reshaping the environment, the user can create pathways, barriers, and structures from existing materials.
